Hey Tim, just wanted to say how much I love and appreciate what you do. I was the same as you, loved space and everything around it, but wasn't clued in at all with what was happening. That was until I stumbled across  that video of the 2 second raptor test about a month or so ago... I was hooked immediately on the space bug and started looking things up, came across your 'biggest booms in rocket history' and since then, you've quickly become one of my favourite internet people. I'm sad about all the exciting stuff I missed last year, but I'm absolutely hyped about this year as it's going to be even bigger, and sooo glad I've got such a great source of information on this stuff; you! I also really love Our Ludicrous Future, you guys gave me quite the insight into Tesla and because of that, I now think they're super cool. It's because of you I took notice of Elon outside of the memes and gained more respect for him. One day, I hope to become a patreon and support you and maybe someday, get to meet you, even though I'm all the way down in Aus! You are seriously an amazing, humble, genuine person and I deeply appreciate all the time and effort you put in just to share your passions with all of us, creating this very excited community. I didn't watch this live, but I've still had it playing all day while I do stuff because I find the conversation you make really, really interesting and I love learning things from you! Even your most "boring" stream has been enjoyable and interesting because of your great personality. Just thank you for all that you do ❤
